entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character who shouts at Hermione and jumps into the fireplace with her.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a person who is jumped into the fireplace with Harry. She is being held by Harry's hand.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a person who is standing beside the sinks, wrestling with Mrs. Cattermole.

entities.name: yaxley
entities.description: Yaxley is a person who casts a curse that sails over Harry's head and later appears in the cubicle.

entities.name: mrs. cattermole
entities.description: Mrs. Cattermole is a person who Ron is wrestling with beside the sinks.

relationships.description: Harry holds Hermione's hand as they jump into the fireplace together.
Harry also holds Ron by the arm as they turn on the spot.
Yaxley casts a curse that sails over Harry's head.
